name: Food Fest
description:
Who has the strongest stomach? A race to the finish, meal after meal!

This is a small project I made a few weeks ago, for Ludum Dare 34. The theme, out of the two for the competition, I chose was "Two Button". I wasn't able to finish for the deadline, but I wanted to put this out in some form. Definitely expect a small update or two in the future as well.

CONTROLS
Submit: Space Bar

Player 1
Left Hand: A key
Right Hand: D key

Player 2
Left Hand: J key
Right Hand: L key

INSTRUCTIONS
Your goal is, using your left and right hand, to eat your list of food as quickly as possible, before the other player finishes theirs. To do this, you alternate between pressing the Left Hand button and the Right Hand button, filling up your Fullness meter. Alternate too quickly, you'll raise your Bloatness meter, shown as the clock symbol at the top. Alternate too slow and you won't feel full in the slightest!

Changing the difficulty changes how much food is on each player's list.

CREDITS
Game Design, Code, Art: Bryce Williams
Art: Gunnar McBeth

Music Credits
Title Screen: "Arpanauts" by Eric Skiff
Gameplay: "RottenMage SpaceJacked OST 09" by sawsquarenoise
Results Screen: "CopperNickle" by UncleBibby
